q: Yesterday is the past, tomorrow is the future, today is a gift - that's why it's called the present.
h:
“Yesterday is the past, tomorrow is the future, today is a gift - that's why it's called the present.” —
George Bernard Shaw

q: No amount of regretting can change the past, and no amount of worrying can change the future.
h:
“No amount of regretting can change the past, and no amount of worrying can change the future.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Don't shortchange yourself when it comes to investing in your own better future.
h:
“Don't shortchange yourself when it comes to investing in your own better future.” —
Jim Rohn

q: The consequences of today are determined by the actions of the past. To change your future, alter your decisions today.
h:
“The consequences of today are determined by the actions of the past. To change your future, alter your decisions today.” —
Unknown

q: Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.
h:
“Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.” —
Oscar Wilde

q: The future belongs to those who learn more skills and combine them in creative ways.
h:
“The future belongs to those who learn more skills and combine them in creative ways.” —
Robert Greene

q: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
h:
“Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.” —
Steve Maraboli

q: No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.
h:
“No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.” —
Alan Watts

q: Do not regret the past. Look to the future.
h:
“Do not regret the past. Look to the future.” —
Soyen Shaku

q: Trying to predict the future is like trying to drive down a country road at night with no lights while looking out the back window.
h:
“Trying to predict the future is like trying to drive down a country road at night with no lights while looking out the back window.” —
Peter Drucker

q: Perfectionism is simply putting a limit on your future.
h:
“Perfectionism is simply putting a limit on your future.” —
John Eliot

q: The future is not a gift. It is an achievement.
h:
“The future is not a gift. It is an achievement.” —
Robert F. Kennedy

q: You can do nothing to change the past, and the future will never come exactly as you plan or hope for.
h:
“You can do nothing to change the past, and the future will never come exactly as you plan or hope for.” —
Dan Millman

q: We take care of the future best by taking care of the present now.
h:
“We take care of the future best by taking care of the present now.” —
Jon Kabat-Zinn

q: The more you are focused on time - past and future - the more you miss the Now, the most precious thing there is.
h:
“The more you are focused on time - past and future - the more you miss the Now, the most precious thing there is.” —
Eckhart Tolle

q: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future.
h:
“Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
h:
“Go for it now. The future is promised to no one. ” —
Wayne Dyer

q: We have a duty to maintain the light of consciousness to make sure it continues into the future.
h:
“We have a duty to maintain the light of consciousness to make sure it continues into the future.” —
Elon Musk

q: People don't realize that now is all there ever is; there is no past or future except as memory or anticipation in your mind.
h:
“People don't realize that now is all there ever is; there is no past or future except as memory or anticipation in your mind.” —
Eckhart Tolle

q: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
h:
“Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

q: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.
h:
“The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.” —
Oprah Winfrey

q: Successful people appreciate where they have come from, but they don't let their past set the tone for their future.
h:
“Successful people appreciate where they have come from, but they don't let their past set the tone for their future.” —
Steve Harvey

q: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
h:
“The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

q: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
h:
“The best way to predict the future is to create it.” —
Abraham Lincoln

q: The present moment dies every moment to become the past , is reborn every moment into the future. All experience is now. Now never ends.
h:
“The present moment dies every moment to become the past , is reborn every moment into the future. All experience is now. Now never ends.” —
Deepak Chopra

q: Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.
h:
“Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.” —
Robin Sharma

q: People do not decide their futures, they decide their habits and their habits decide their futures.
h:
“People do not decide their futures, they decide their habits and their habits decide their futures.” —
Gary Keller

q: The more you take responsibility for your past and present, the more you are able to create the future you seek.
h:
“The more you take responsibility for your past and present, the more you are able to create the future you seek.” —
Celestine Chua

q: It's what you do in the present that will redeem the past and thereby change the future.
h:
“It's what you do in the present that will redeem the past and thereby change the future.” —
Paulo Coelho

q: The future depends on what you do today.
h:
“The future depends on what you do today. ” —
Mahatma Gandhi

q: The future is the worst thing about the present.
h:
“The future is the worst thing about the present.” —
Gustave Flaubert

q: Everything starts with a dream. A particle of our imagination that teases us of what the future could be like, as long as we fight for it.
h:
“Everything starts with a dream. A particle of our imagination that teases us of what the future could be like, as long as we fight for it.” —
Gurbaksh Chahal

q: If you want to be happy, do not dwell in the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
h:
“If you want to be happy, do not dwell in the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Life needs to be more than just solving problems every day. You need to wake up and be excited about the future.
h:
“Life needs to be more than just solving problems every day. You need to wake up and be excited about the future.” —
Elon Musk

q: Heal the past, live the present, dream the future.
h:
“Heal the past, live the present, dream the future.” —
Mary Engelbreit

q: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
h:
“The best way to predict your future is to create it.” —
Abraham Lincoln

q: Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care of itself.
h:
“Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care of itself.” —
Andrew Carnegie

q: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. if you are at peace, you are living in the present.
h:
“If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. if you are at peace, you are living in the present.” —
Lao Tzu

q: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
h:
“Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.” —
Buddha

q: The future will be shaped by those willing to commit their minds and their bodies to the task.
h:
“The future will be shaped by those willing to commit their minds and their bodies to the task.” —
Robert F. Kennedy

q: When you make a choice, you change the future.
h:
“When you make a choice, you change the future.” —
Deepak Chopra

q: Your past does not equal your future.
h:
“Your past does not equal your future.” —
Tony Robbins

q: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
h:
“Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.” —
Wayne Dyer

q: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
h:
“I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.” —
Thomas Jefferson

q: You're always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
h:
“You're always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.” —
Richard Bach

q: The future doesn't belong to the faint-hearted; it belongs to the brave.
h:
“The future doesn't belong to the faint-hearted; it belongs to the brave.” —
Ronald Reagan

q: Every time you are tempted to react in the same old way, ask if you want to be a prisoner of the past or a pioneer of the future.
h:
“Every time you are tempted to react in the same old way, ask if you want to be a prisoner of the past or a pioneer of the future.” —
Deepak Chopra

q: It is children only who enjoy the present; their elders either live on the memory of the past or the hope of the future.
h:
“It is children only who enjoy the present; their elders either live on the memory of the past or the hope of the future.” —
Nicolas Chamfort

q: The future is no more uncertain than the present.
h:
“The future is no more uncertain than the present.” —
Walt Whitman
